name: RTC-ONE
description:
Story
Aliens have invaded the earth's solar system and already build structures to take over the planet. The RTC-ONE is the only ship that can stop them. You are now sent out to take care of the enemy and destroy the alien's mother ship.

Features
- Random gameplay
- 5 Pickups
- 3 levels of difficulty
- C64 style chip music
- Retro style GFX
- short gameplay, perfect when waiting for downloads , updates or just to have a break :-)

Input

Keyboard, X-Box Controller, Gamepad

Controllers: use DPAD and A-Button
Keyboard:  WASD , Arrows and Space
